button.pay.description: Text in button, used to pay for the הזמנה.

button.continuePay.description: Text in button, used to continue paying for the הזמנה.

button.checkDetail.description: Text in button, used to view הזמנה פרטים.

button.query.description: Text in button, used to query the הזמנה.

button.finish.description: Text in button, used to manually complete the הזמנה.

button.update.description: Text in button, used to עדכון the הזמנה.

field.amount.description: The point כמות of the הזמנה.

field.price.description: The point כמות of the הזמנה.

field.createdAt.description: The creation זמן of the הזמנה.

field.payWay.description: The תשלום אמצעי for the הזמנה.

field.proxy.description: Proxy is an online שירות, referring to an HTTP proxy used for data transmission.

message.orderExpired.message: ההזמנה פגה תוקף. צור/י הזמנה חדשה כדי לשלם.

message.wechatPayHelp.message: פתח/י WeChat בטלפון וסרוק/י כדי להשלים את התשלום.

message.confirmFinish.message: This action will manually set the הזמנה to paid סטטוס and complete the distribution process, which cannot be undone. נא אשר/י that the customer has completed the תשלום, do you want to continue?

state.pending.description: The סטטוס of the הזמנה, indicating that the הזמנה is still waiting for user תשלום.

state.paid.description: The סטטוס of the הזמנה, indicating that the הזמנה has been paid.

state.finished.description: The סטטוס of the הזמנה, indicating that the הזמנה has been completed.

state.expired.description: The סטטוס of the הזמנה, indicating that the הזמנה has expired.

state.failed.description: The סטטוס of the הזמנה, indicating that the תשלום for the הזמנה has נכשל.

title.info.description: Title displayed as the website title, indicating הזמנה information.

title.wechatPay.description: Title displayed as the website title, indicating WeChat תשלום.

title.aliPay.description: Title displayed as the website title, indicating Alipay תשלום, which is an online תשלום.

title.stripe.description: Title displayed as the website title, indicating Stripe תשלום, which is an online תשלום.

title.manageOrder.description: Title displayed as the website title, indicating הזמנה management.

title.x402.description: Title displayed as the website title, indicating cryptocurrency תשלום (based on the X402 תשלום scheme).

message.discountTag.description: Text for the badge showing the applied discount percentage.

message.discountHint.message: As our exclusive VIP customer, you can automatically enjoy a {percent}% discount.
message.discountHint.description: Text explaining to the user that they automatically enjoy a discount due to VIP סטטוס.

message.x402DiscountApplied.message: Enjoy an additional {percent}% OFF with X402 תשלום.
message.x402DiscountApplied.description: Text explaining the additional discount brought by X402 תשלום.

message.x402DiscountTag.description: Highlighting the discount percentage that can be additionally enjoyed by choosing X402 תשלום.

message.x402DiscountHint.message: Select X402 תשלום to enjoy an additional {percent}% OFF discount immediately.
message.x402DiscountHint.description: A hint to inform users that they can unlock an additional discount by using X402 תשלום.

message.x402IntroShort.message: Complete USDC תשלום directly with your ארנק.

message.x402TabWallet.description: Title for the ארנק תשלום tab.

message.x402WalletTitle.description: Title for the X402 ארנק quick תשלום (USDC).

message.x402WalletConnected.description: Label displayed when the ארנק is connected.

message.x402ConnectWallet.description: Text for the button to חבר/י the EVM ארנק.

message.x402NoWalletDesc.message: נא use a browser that supports wallets (recommended Chrome/Brave), or install the Meta Mask/Phantom extension; you can also open this page in the built in browser of your mobile ארנק app.
message.x402NoWalletDesc.description: General description for when no ארנק is available.

message.x402SwitchNetwork.message: נא switch your ארנק network to {network}
message.x402SwitchNetwork.description: Text prompting the user to switch to the specified chain network.

message.x402SolanaNotEnabled.message: Solana X402 backend is not yet enabled.
message.x402SolanaNotEnabled.description: פרומפט when the הזמנה has not enabled Solana X402.

message.x402NeedConnectAccount.description: Reminder displayed when the ארנק is not connected.

message.x402ConfirmTitle.description: Title for the X402 תשלום confirmation popup.

message.x402ConfirmDesc.description: Description for the X402 תשלום confirmation popup.

message.x402Step1.message: חבר/י your ארנק (if not installed, נא install the extension and refresh this page or open this page with your mobile ארנק)

message.x402Step2.message: Modify ארנק settings to אשר/י the ארנק network is {network}

message.x402Step3.message: Click 'Use ארנק to Pay' and complete the authorization signature in your ארנק

message.x402Step4.message: After successful signing, we will automatically settle, and this page will refresh to show that תשלום has been completed.

message.x402IntegrationResourceLabel.description: Label for the תשלום API address.

message.x402IntegrationPayToLabel.description: Label displaying the blockchain settlement address.

message.x402IntegrationNetworkLabel.description: Label displaying the blockchain network name.

message.x402IntegrationFallback.message: נכשל to retrieve complete session data, נא refer to the developer documentation or contact support for necessary פרמטרים.
message.x402IntegrationFallback.description: Message displayed when session data cannot be retrieved.

message.x402IntegrationDocsCta.description: Text for the action button to open the developer guide.

message.x402InstallGuideTitle.description: Title for the ארנק installation instructions popup.

message.x402InstallGuideDesc.message: נא follow the שלבים below to complete the installation of the {wallet} extension, then use the button below to refresh this page to re detect the ארנק.
message.x402InstallGuideDesc.description: Description guiding users to complete the ארנק extension installation.

message.x402InstallGuideStep1.message: Open the newly opened page to הורד and install the {wallet} browser extension (recommended Chrome/Brave).

message.x402InstallGuideStep2.message: Complete the extension installation, log in/unlock, and אשר/י that it is enabled in the current browser profile.

message.x402InstallGuideStep3.message: להחזיר to this page, click 'I have installed' and refresh before trying to 'חבר/י ארנק' again.

message.x402InstallGuideConfirm.description: Main button after completing ארנק installation.

message.x402NetworkGuideTitle.description: Title for the network mismatch instructions popup.

message.x402NetworkGuideDesc.message: נא follow the שלבים below to switch your ארנק network to {network}, and refresh this page to re detect after completion.
message.x402NetworkGuideDesc.description: Description guiding users to adjust their ארנק network.

message.x402NetworkGuideStep1.message: Open the ארנק extension, go to Settings > Active Networks.

message.x402NetworkGuideStep2.message: In the network list, אשר/י that {network} (or another specified network) is enabled. If it is enabled, you can ignore this step.
message.x402NetworkGuideStep2.description: Instructions for the second step of adjusting the network, no need to turn off Ethereum.

message.x402NetworkGuideStep3.message: להחזיר to this page and click 'I have completed the setup' to refresh and try the תשלום again.

message.x402NetworkGuideConfirm.description: Main button after completing the network setup.

message.x402NetworkSwitchFailed.message: The current ארנק does not support automatic network switching. נא manually switch to the specified network in the ארנק and try again.
message.x402NetworkSwitchFailed.description: פרומפט to inform the user that the ארנק does not support automatic network switching and needs to switch manually.

message.x402PaymentFailed.message: X402 ארנק תשלום נכשל, נא try again later. If it fails multiple times, נא contact support and provide the error information.
message.x402PaymentFailed.description: General error פרומפט that appears when X402 ארנק תשלום fails.

message.x402WalletPayCta.description: Button text for completing תשלום using the bound ארנק.

button.refund.description: Text in the button for manually refunding an הזמנה.

field.applicationId.description: The application ID associated with the הזמנה.

field.serviceId.description: The שירות ID corresponding to the discount.

field.generalDiscount.description: Label displayed when the discount applies to all services.

field.userId.description: The user ID that enjoys the discount.

field.discount.description: The discount אחוז applied to the user's הזמנה.

field.actions.description: Title for the action button column.

message.confirmRefund.message: This action will revoke the rights of this הזמנה and mark it as refunded, and cannot be undone. נא אשר/י that you have processed the refund, do you want to continue?

message.x402IntegrationIntro.message: The current הזמנה uses the X402 תשלום protocol. נא complete the integration on the server side based on the פרמטרים below and initiate the תשלום.
message.x402IntegrationIntro.description: Introduction to the need to use the X402 protocol.

message.x402IntegrationProtocol.message: Call the facilitator תשלום interface and complete the signature broadcast. After successful settlement, להחזיר to this page to אשר/י the סטטוס.
message.x402IntegrationProtocol.description: Instructions for completing the X402 תשלום operation שלבים.

message.x402IntegrationDocsHint.message: Want to know more פרטים? נא check the development documentation below.
message.x402IntegrationDocsHint.description: Text reminding users that they can get more information through the development documentation.

message.x402WalletTitleEvm.description: Title for the EVM ארנק connection card.

message.x402WalletTitleSolana.description: Title for the Solana ארנק connection card.

message.x402WalletStatusQr.description: Label for the Wallet Connect QR code entry.

message.x402WalletConnectTitle.description: Title for the Wallet Connect QR code popup.

message.x402WalletConnectPreparing.description: פרומפט when preparing the Wallet Connect connection.

message.x402WalletConnectOpenWallet.description: Button text to invoke the ארנק via Wallet Connect on mobile.

message.x402WalletConnectScanHint.message: נא use a ארנק that supports Wallet Connect to scan the QR code.
message.x402WalletConnectScanHint.description: פרומפט text below the Wallet Connect QR code.

message.x402SwitchNetworkCta.description: CTA for clicking to switch networks.

message.x402NoWalletTitle.description: Title when no EVM ארנק is injected in the browser.

message.x402NoWalletSafariDesc.message: Safari usually does not support extensions like MetaMask. It is recommended to use Chrome/Brave or open this page in the built in browser of the mobile ארנק app.
message.x402NoWalletSafariDesc.description: Description for no ארנק in Safari environment.

message.x402ConnectWC.description: Button text for connecting with Wallet Connect.

message.x402RefreshDetect.description: Button text for re detecting the ארנק.

message.x402MissingWCProjectId.message: Wallet Connect Project ID not configured (נא set the environment variable VITE WALLETCONNECT PROJECT מזהה)
message.x402MissingWCProjectId.description: פרומפט for missing Wallet Connect project ID.

message.x402WalletBound.description: Badge displayed when the ארנק is bound.

message.userIdRequired.description: פרומפט message displayed when the user ID is empty.

message.serviceIdRequired.description: פרומפט message displayed when the שירות ID is empty.

message.discountRequired.message: נא enter a discount between 0 and 1.
message.discountRequired.description: פרומפט message displayed when the discount is not within the valid range.

message.discountCreated.description: פרומפט message displayed when a new discount is successfully נוצר.

message.discountUpdated.description: פרומפט message displayed when a discount is successfully edited.

message.discountDeleted.description: פרומפט message displayed when a discount is successfully deleted.

state.refunded.description: The סטטוס of the הזמנה, indicating that the הזמנה has been refunded.

title.revenueAnalysis.description: Title of the revenue analysis page.

title.last7dRevenue.message: Transaction כמות in the אחרון Week
title.last7dRevenue.description: Transaction כמות in the אחרון week.

title.last30dRevenue.message: Transaction כמות in the אחרון Month
title.last30dRevenue.description: Transaction כמות in the אחרון 30 days.

title.last90dRevenue.message: Transaction כמות in the אחרון Quarter
title.last90dRevenue.description: Transaction כמות in the אחרון 90 days.

title.revenueTrend.description: Title of the revenue trend line chart.

title.manageOrderDiscount.description: Title of the הזמנה discount management page.

title.discountLookup.description: Title of the section displaying the user's current discounts.

title.createDiscount.description: Title of the section for creating a new discount.

title.updateDiscount.description: Title of the popup for editing a discount.
